pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, June 1, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, June 1, 2016:

Ottawa

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Chinaâ€™s Minister of Foreign Affairs, Wang Yi.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks at the Pride Flag Raising Ceremony.

Centre Block
Main Entrance
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
